text: The Ministry of Communication and Information Technology() is governmental body of Nepal that manages postal services, telecommunications, broadcasting, press and information and film development in the country. Nainkala Thapa is the present minister for this ministry since June 10 2021, who was minister for Women, Children and Senior Citizen ministry. Through its subdivisions, the ministry informs the public about economic and social activities in Nepal, while promoting democratic culture through ensuring the freedom of expression and the right to information of the People of Nepal.
